title: Victoria the matchmaker
itunes:title: Victoria the matchmaker
itunes:subtitle: Author and TV producer Deborah Cadbury discusses her new book Queen Victoria’s Matchmaking, which reveals how the 19th-century British monarch sought to influence the future of Europe through the marriages of her descendants
description:
Author and TV producer Deborah Cadbury discusses her new book Queen Victoria’s Matchmaking, which reveals how the 19th-century British monarch sought to influence the future of Europe through the marriages of her descendants

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
